title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
fish <- read_xlsx("fish_master.xlsx", sheet = "densities")

fish %>% 
  select(-(7:9), -(11:13)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(numerical_density = numerical_density_n_m2_total, 
         biomass_density = biomass_density_g_m2_total,
         ph = p_h)

fish <- pivot_longer(fish, numerical_density:conductivity, names_to = "measurement_type", values_to = "result")



```
